options: Start

questions.text: It's a nice sunny morning, you wake up, yawn, roll over, and notice an envelope on your nightstand.
options: A letter? I wonder what it is. You open it with excitement
Hmm.. I wonder what this could be... You open it with caution

questions.text: Before you can open the envelope, it flips around and says “I've been waiting to meet you, hero.
options: I don't care if this is a dream or not I'm soooo ready for this.
Is this real? What is even going on??

questions.text: What are you waiting for hero? Are you ready to join us?
options: Hold on, I have to go to work, feed the cat, brush my teeth…
I have to tell my mom and my friends, wait…

questions.text: The envelope grabs your hand and brings you through a portal.
options: OMG, Where am I going? How is this even possible? I'm gonna get a headache from this.
No way! This is so cool!

questions.text: You walk towards them and notice they are humanoid cats! They notice you and approach you asking if you need a guide. You agree and you choose:
options: A chatty & friendly cat named Haru.
A silent and honest cat named Boo.

questions.text: As your guide is taking you around the town, you realize the city is pretty far. What transportation do you choose?
options: A unicorn, I don't know how to ride one yet, but it looks fun and I'm sure I can figure it out.
The car, I know how to drive one and I can get to the city ASAP

questions.text: You reach your destination and you see a garden and a castle, which one do you choose?
options: The castle duh! I need to figure out what all this is about.
The garden, I wanna meet new friends and explore the beautiful land

questions.text: After choosing, you look around a bit and end up seeing a troll. What do you do?
options: Approach him and demand him to tell you where to go
Kindly ask him where you should be headed and take your time chatting with him.

questions.text: The troll tells you that you must enter through a cave to find what you are looking for.
options: I can't wait to see what's waiting there for me, perhaps a magic sword?
A cave? Is there no other way?

questions.text: You start going down the cave and see a sleeping bear, with what seems to be a glowing scroll, what do you do?
options: Take the scroll as quietly as I can and book it.
Take some time to figure out the best possible solution to take the scroll without getting hurt

questions.text: Before you make your move, the bear wakes up and growls at your presence. What are you doing?
options: Running and fighting
The bear is kind of cute, I will try my best to reason with it.

questions.text: You wake up in your bed. You look around and see that the envelope is in your hand.
options: That had to be a dream right? I'm glad I'm out of it.
OMG, I'm glad I'm back, I wonder what the envelope says…
Continue
